title: A New ‘M*A*S*H’ Scene: Written by ChatGPT, Read by Hawkeye and B.J.
description: Alan Alda, the star of the long-running sitcom, asked the artificial intelligence software to create a script for him and his former co-star Mike Farrell to read.

title: Biden F.C.C. Nominee Withdraws
description: Gigi Sohn, who was first nominated by President Biden in October 2021, said she had faced “unrelenting, dishonest and cruel attacks” on her character and career.

title: The Daring Ruse That Exposed China’s Campaign to Steal American Secrets
description: How the downfall of one intelligence agent revealed the astonishing depth of Chinese industrial espionage.
